metadata.title: CVE-2023-47282 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds write in Intel(R) Media SDK all versions and some Intel(R)oneVPL software before version 23.3.5 may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
onevpl package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
